Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory32.jpg'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryGanRanNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Not long after pressing onward, a familiar figure appears among the projections in the ruins.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryGanRanNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Is that... the boy we just saw?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryGanRanNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'A boy stands on the lofty ruins, looking out at the destroyed block.'}
{3: 'He resembles a Corrupted with the amount of broken parts on his body.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryGanRanNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Looks like he failed to become an Ascendant like Roland...', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryGanRanNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The boy stumbles forward in the ruins. His eyes, once full of anger, are now devoid of any semblance of emotion.'}
{3: 'Even though it is just a projection, he is still entwined with red current.'}
{2: "He's already deteriorated into a Corrupted.", 3: '28', 4: 'This must have happened when he returned from that place.', 5: '28'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryGanRanNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "But didn't Roland give him an invitation? Why would he let him become a Corrupted?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Because he was still required to "make it there alive."', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Looks like he failed.', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory32.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryGanRanNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The young Construct continues to wander the deserted ruins, occasionally looking at the sky and making some mechanical and meaningless gestures.'}
{3: 'Suddenly, a female scavenger stops by the ruins.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Female Scavenger', 3: 'Jett?!', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Whether the young Corrupted hears a name or simply a loud noise, he turns around and staggers toward the female scavenger.'}
{2: 'Female Scavenger', 3: '...How could you turn into a...', 4: '2'}
{3: 'She begins to weep and takes out a smooshed piece of bread from her backpack, apparently handing it to the boy.'}
{2: 'Female Scavenger', 3: 'Do you... hate... Mommy?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The boy is unable to respond now that he is a Corrupted.'}
{2: 'Female Scavenger', 3: "But if Mommy didn't hand you to that Daedalus corporation... we would've all starved to death...", 4: '2'}
{3: 'As she weeps, she becomes more heartbroken, but the boy still does not respond. Instead, he continues to walk slowly toward her.'}
{2: 'Female Scavenger', 3: 'I heard some soldiers say that... you were here on a mission... So I wanted to see you again...', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Saying that, she wept quietly.'}
{2: 'Female Scavenger', 3: 'But... h-how... did... y-you ... turn into t-this...', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'While his mother cries, the boy hobbles toward her like a toddler learning to walk. He steps on a loose brick, then slides down the ruins.'}
{2: 'Female Scavenger', 3: 'Jett! Jett...!', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The female scavenger hurries to help the boy up, and hands him the piece of bread.'}
{2: 'Female Scavenger', 3: "I'm sorry... It's all I have left... You can have it...", 4: '2'}
{3: 'He opens his mouth like a toddler to eat the bread his mother gives him, but then—'}
{3: '—bites off her hand in the process.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Female Scavenger', 3: 'AHHHHHHHHHH!!!', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The woman unleashes a blood-curdling scream from the pain. It seems that she has not noticed... or rather, cannot accept that her child has turned into a Corrupted.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryGanRanNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: "Liv's outstretched hand falls helplessly by her side. The four of you know that there is nothing you can do that could change what happened."}
{3: 'The female scavenger clutches her severed wrist, then hurriedly gets up to run away.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Female Scavenger', 3: 'Why do you... hate me so much! Mommy just... just wanted us... to survive!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Female Scavenger', 3: 'I simply chose... our best chance of survival! I never meant... to abandon you!', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryGanRanNew.prefab', 3: '2'}
{3: 'The woman falls to the ground from the pain in her severed arm. Too weak to stand, she helplessly watches as her son approaches with each step.'}
{2: 'Female Scavenger', 3: '...Mommy just... just...', 4: '1'}
{3: "He thrusts his hand right through his mother's chest, causing blood to spew out of her mouth. She still fights through the agony to say her last words."}
{2: 'Female Scavenger', 3: 'Mommy... failed you...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Female Scavenger', 3: 'I wanted... to make us... a happy family...', 4: '1'}
{3: "Unfazed by his mother's last words, the Corrupted boy drags his mother down the street as she breathes her dying breaths."}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryGanRanNew.prefab', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Liv remains silent for a moment, then raises her head and looks firmly at the three of you.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "...Let's go. The sooner we put an end to the Ascendants and the Red Tide, the sooner we can prevent something like this from ever happening again!", 4: '1'}
{2: "You're right. Let's go.", 3: '97', 4: "That's the Liv I know.", 5: '97'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Alright, let's keep going.", 4: '1'}
